text: 10:29 Ua Me Ini 24:8; 1 Korin 11:29; Efesus 4:30; Hibru 12:25Ia manmaghɨn gumazir akɨrim ragha Godɨn Otarim gasarazim gɨnɨghnɨsi? Gumazir kam a bar osɨmtɨzir ekiam iniam. Egh an ivezir kuram, gumazir Moses Osirizir Araziba batoghezimɨn ivezir kuram, bar a gafiragham. Kraisɨn ghuzim Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir Igiam gamima a gavgafi. Ezɨ ghuzir kam gumazir kam gamizɨma a zuegha Godɨn gumazimɨn oto. Egha datɨrɨghɨn gumazir kam a Kraisɨn ghuzim mɨgɨa ghaze, a pura bizim. Egha a, Godɨn Duar apangkuvim en itim, an tiragha akaba a gasi.
